details.title: Workflow Management

description.point: Lead Design and development of workflow management for Cargoes Runner Platform from scratch, perfomed performance tunning by reducing high latency api.

Successfully expanded finance applications of all regions in US with 98% data accuracy.

details.title: Agent Finance

description.point: Worked in building finance applications at compass for real estate agents which shows the state of their business in near real time.
Lead the revamp of existing architecture to a more simple and scalable architecture. Improved system by 90% faster and reduced cost of RDS usage by 50%.
Successfully expanded finance applications of all regions in US with 98% data accuracy.

details.languages: Java, Hibernate, POSTgreSQL, Google Guice, Kafka, python, GRPC, Airflow, Kubernetes, Thrift, Datadog

details.title: API services, MailBox, Email Integration and Reporting and Analytics in CorDL
